project.name: Firebrick UI API
project.description: Firebrick UI API: a component library for Firebrick MVC, Knockout JS, jQuery and Bootstrap

Firebrick.ui.name: Firebrick.ui
Firebrick.ui.description: Firebrick component library for Firebrick JS MVC

components.common.Base.name: components.common.Base
components.common.Base.description: Super class for all components. Extends from Firebrick.view.Base

components.common.MultiplesBase.name: components.common.MultiplesBase
components.common.MultiplesBase.description: Base for inputs where multiple options are possible: checkboxes, radio and togglesbuttons for example

ui.name: ui
ui.description: Firebrick component library for Firebrick JS MVC

classitems.description: if true - att "navbar-btn" class to the button
classitems.name: navbarItem
btnStyle
classitems.type: {Boolean|String} false | (default, primary, success, info, warning, danger, link)

classitems.description: used to inject something before the text <span>
classitems.name: beforeText

classitems.description: used to inject something after the text <span>
classitems.name: afterText

classitems.description: set as string to give the button stateful capabilities.
classitems.name: loadingText
classitems.type: {Boolean|String} when set as string, the value is assigned to the button "button-loading-text" attribute

classitems.description: options that are to be shown by the toggle button : [{text:"abc", active:true}, "b", "c", "d"]
classitems.name: options

classitems.description: default configuration for direct children - i.e. direct items
classitems.name: defaults

classitems.description: if you are calling _getItems from a nested scope then use this function
classitems.name: _getItemsScoped

params.name: itemsName
params.description: name of property to get items from

classitems.description: passed on to the toolbar items (direct children only)
classitems.name: toolbarDefaults

classitems.description: add css classes and other configuration to the container
classitems.name: toolbarContainer

params.name: obj
params.description: obj that is later pass to the binder

classitems.description: component id, not the _classId - however if none specified it will default to the _classId
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: used when filtering component classes when searching
classitems.name: uiComponent

classitems.description: all css classes (comma separated) are added to the standard bindings function
classitems.name: css

classitems.description: variable shortcuts are created using the uiName. by default the string after the last "-" is used
classitems.name: uiName
tooltip
classitems.type: {Boolean|String} set to false to deactivate, string to set the text

classitems.name: popover
classitems.type: {Boolean|String} set to false to deactivate, string to set the text

classitems.name: popoverTitle
classitems.type: {Boolean|String} optional - set to false to deactivate, string to set the title

classitems.description: pass a binding Object and this method will add the tooltip/popover relevant properties
classitems.name: addTooltipPopoverBind

classitems.description: pass a binding Object and this method will add the popover relevant properties
classitems.name: addPopoverBind

classitems.description: use this as a wrapper in a template if the property you wish to call COULD be either a primitive or a function
classitems.name: b

classitems.description: when overriding this or any other method, this.callParent(arguments) calls the method in the super class
classitems.name: init

params.name: prop
params.description: [prop=tpl] optional - name of property to template

params.name: force
params.description: [force=false] optional - set to true to force a retemplate

params.name: prop
params.description: [prop="tpl"] optional - name of property to build

classitems.description: if no id is specified it will call getClassId() and use that value
classitems.name: getId

classitems.description: called when calling {{{getSubTpl}}} in component template
classitems.name: getSubTpl

classitems.description:
find the parent of this class
iterate up the inheritance tree looking for a classname that differs from the current and that "subTpl" or "tpl" don't match either
classitems.name: _getParent

classitems.description: called when calling {{{getParentTpl}}} in component template
classitems.name: getParentTpl

classitems.description: called when calling {{{getParentSubTpl}}} in component template
classitems.name: getParentSubTpl

classitems.description: clean string - i.e. remove all ' from string
classitems.name: cleanString

classitems.description: attach ' to the start and end of the string for KO binds
classitems.name: parseBind

classitems.description: takes a string and prepares it for Firebrick text call
classitems.name: textBind

classitems.description: whether the progress bar should be shown on form submission
classitems.name: showProgress

classitems.description: this function requires the HTML5 function FormData to be supported
classitems.name: getFormData

classitems.description: make sure this.url is set before calling this function
classitems.name: submit

classitems.description: auto will attempt to provide the column width by dividing the number of items in the parent Grid by 12 - decimals will be rounded down
classitems.name: columnWidth

classitems.description:
when property columnWidth is set to "auto", this function will attempt to calculate the correct size for each column.
Note: this function will round down to the nearest whole number - 5 columns will result in size 2 for each column
the number of columns are divided by 12 (BS3 grid)
classitems.name: _getColumnWidth

classitems.description: if true - the modal will popup after .create() has been called
classitems.name: showOnCreate

classitems.description: used to created the <h{int}></h{int}> tags in the header
classitems.name: titleSize

classitems.description: string = (default, primary, success, info, warning, danger)
classitems.name: panelTypeClass

classitems.description: fill the panel body (can be html too)
classitems.name: content

classitems.description: whether the content is just text
classitems.name: contentTextual
headerIcons
classitems.type: {Boolean|Array of Objects} boolean = false, if object use the same way as the "items" property

classitems.description: use this to provide the given panel with toolbars
classitems.name: toolbar

classitems.description: whether the alert is dismissible - also controls whether the X button is shown or not
classitems.name: dismissible

classitems.description: use to determine whether h1, h2, h3 etc - default = 1
classitems.name: headerSize

classitems.description: change to a url if you wish to convert the header into a link
classitems.name: href

classitems.description: use this property for responsive images. Define in order of sizes with the largest first!
classitems.name: sizes

classitems.description: use this property in conjunction with "sizes" - mirror the image sizes with that of the "sizes" order
classitems.name: srcset

classitems.description: type of list, ul or ol
classitems.name: listType

classitems.description: defaults to true but only comes into effect with property "listGroup"
classitems.name: listItemGroupClass

classitems.description: items to parse into the list
classitems.name: data

classitems.description: unstyled - applies list-unstyled css class to list container (ul/ol)
classitems.name: unstyled

classitems.description:
inject a template into the
  • {preItemTpl}{postItemTpl}
    • item
classitems.name: preItemTpl

classitems.description:
inject a template into the
  • {preItemTpl}{postItemTpl}
    • item
classitems.name: postItemTpl

classitems.description: wrap the list element content in a link
classitems.name: linkedList
value
classitems.type: {Integer|String|Function} use a string or function for data binding

classitems.description: whether or not to show a label with the progress bar
classitems.name: showLabel

classitems.description: used to append to the data-value attribute value
classitems.name: dataSymbol

classitems.description: whether text is raw html or not
classitems.name: isHtml

classitems.description: false not to show, string for footer text
classitems.name: blockQuoteFooter
inputclass, attached to the <label> wrapper instead of the input element

classitems.description: if none specified then the name is set to that of this.type
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: passed on to the toolbar items (direct children only)
classitems.name: toolbarDefaults
navTypeClass
classitems.type: {Boolean|String} string: navbar-fixed-top, navbar-static-top, navbar-fixed-top, navbar-fixed-bottom, navbar-inverse (navbarDefaultClass=false)

classitems.description: if false then the navigation won't collapse to the small menu button
classitems.name: toggleButton

classitems.description: brand text - false to show none or if you wish to use brandTpl instead
classitems.name: brandText

classitems.description: sets nav && nav-bar css classes to the list container
classitems.name: navClass

classitems.description: sets the bootstrap css class "responsive" to the table
classitems.name: responsiveClass

classitems.description: activates the responsive-table-js package on the table
classitems.name: responsive

classitems.description: return js object to pass to the DataTable function for configuring the table on rendered
classitems.name: dataTableConfig

classitems.description: whether to show the collapse / expand buttons for the treetable
classitems.name: showOptions

classitems.description: return js object to pass to the Treetable function for configuring the table on rendered
classitems.name: treeTableConfig

classitems.description: used to cache pointers to classes when searching by "uiName"
classitems.name: _searchCache

classitems.description: populate a target with fields and data
classitems.name: build

props.name: target
props.description: selector string, jquery object (optional) if none passed, html is returned

props.name: view
props.description: Firebrick view class (optional), must be defined for rendered event to be fired

classitems.description:
components uiNames are populated into this map for variable access
fb.ui.cmp.input
classitems.name: cmp

classitems.description:
recursive function
create components and html from an array of items
classitems.name: _populate

classitems.description: get a component class by its shortname... uiName
classitems.name: getByShortName

classitems.description: convert a JS Object into a simple "json" type string, this is mainly used for the data-bind attribute in Knockout
classitems.name: stringify

params.name: func
params.description: function to call when the renderer is used - parameters given to the function when called: $data, $context, $parent, $root
